data.title: Maple Grove Cemetery
data.text:
Maple Grove Cemetery ~ A-K

Click on image for a larger view. Image submitted by Jan Foss

Maple Grove A-K Maple Grove L-Z

This is a partial listing of this cemetery. If you have anything additional you would like to add or better yet the full cemetery listing, please let Marsha know. Many names were submitted by Tamara Kincaide and Judy. See also Tamara's cemetery listing for Maple Grove Cemetery. Pictures by Judy Featherstone unless otherwise noted.

Exel file of Maple Grove, Section 7, part 1 - by Lynn Spohr

This is the spread sheet for the first 3 rows. People have been buried between rows and maybe even section expanded. I will be going through the old records and hit 10 in a row that match the pictures and old data then I will have a bunch that is not in the old data. Since I took pictures in rows I am listing them as I took them. I made sure that the first stone I started with in a row matched the row in the old data.
